attributes.action: take action to force Steve Mclaren to quit as England manager.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ok so I know that this petition probably won't get noticed officially but I just wanted to see how many people share my concern for our national pride.  Action needs to be taken asap to stop things getting any worse! (like they could) all comments welcome.

Andy

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
